desc: Your favourite LMO experiences are now available for purchase online. Shop our homemade delicacies or the Mandarin Oriental Signature spa products for yourself or your loved ones.

layout.text: Celebrate Mid-Autumn Festival with The Landmark Mandarin Oriental’s contemporary mooncake handbag.  Inspired by graphics of moonshine and galaxy, the reusable bag is priced at HKD438 and contains six delicate mini egg custard mooncakes for festive get-togethers.
